statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, distance FROM vehicle_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes WHERE end_location = 'Town B' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM vehicle_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance, COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM vehicle_routes;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(distance) AS max_distance FROM vehicle_routes GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING max_distance > 500;
SELECT * FROM delivery_locations;
SELECT location_id, address FROM delivery_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT address, location_id FROM delivery_locations WHERE address LIKE 'Main%';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT address FROM delivery_locations ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_locations WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT location_id, address FROM delivery_locations WHERE location_id > 2 ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT MAX(distance) AS longest_distance FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT * FROM delivery_locations;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity > 10 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM delivery_locations WHERE location_name ILIKE '%central%';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE current_capacity < max_capacity;
SELECT route_id, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, max_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity > 10 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT dl.location_name, r.distance FROM delivery_locations dl JOIN routes r ON dl.id = r.end_location_id WHERE r.distance < 150 ORDER BY r.distance ASC;

SELECT v.vehicle_type, dl.location_name FROM vehicles v JOIN routes r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id JOIN delivery_locations dl ON r.start_location_id = dl.id WHERE v.vehicle_type = 'Truck' ORDER BY dl.location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryLocations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeliveryLocations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, max_capacity FROM Vehicles;
SELECT * FROM Routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM Routes WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryLocations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeliveryLocations WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100;

SELECT Vehicles.vehicle_name, max_capacity, current_load, location_name AS start_location, distance FROM Vehicles JOIN Routes ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = Routes.vehicle_id JOIN DeliveryLocations ON Routes.start_location_id = DeliveryLocations.location_id;

SELECT ShortestPaths.path_id, Routes.route_id, location_name, sequence_no FROM ShortestPaths JOIN Routes ON ShortestPaths.route_id = Routes.route_id JOIN DeliveryLocations ON ShortestPaths.location_id = DeliveryLocations.location_id WHERE sequence_no < 5;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryLocations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeliveryLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM Routes WHERE distance < 100;
SELECT * FROM LocationsGraph WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryLocations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeliveryLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT Routes.route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance, Vehicles.vehicle_type FROM Routes INNER JOIN Vehicles ON Routes.vehicle_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM LocationsGraph WHERE connected_locations @> '[{"location_id": 10}]';
